Header: Basil Rajapaksa’s case fixed doe 09th August
Content: The case filed against two persons including former Minister Basil Rajapaksa over the misuse of a sum of over 36 million rupees will be taken up for hearing on the 09th of August. This order was given by the Colombo High Court. They are accused of committing this financial fraud by purchasing GI pipes from funds of the Divi Neguma Development Department and distributing them among Local bodies. The other defendant of this case is former Director General of the Department Kithsiri Ranawaka. It was revealed when the case was taken up in Courts today that the documents of the complainant’s party had been handed over to the defence party.
